jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: The Intern Engineer position involves design, analysis and detailing of structural systems for large, complex structures in many market sectors, primarily Type I construction. Interns will work directly with a Project Manager and a team of structural engineers in a dynamic office environment. Interns will be exposed to a wide variety of exciting and challenging projects. We are seeking a talented and enthusiastic Entry-Level Software Engineer to join our growing team in Los Angeles. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in computer science principles and experience in programming languages such as C++, C#, and Java. They will be passionate about technology and have a demonstrated ability to learn new concepts quickly.
requirements: Degree in Computer Science or a related field
Experience with React and Node.js
Design, develop, and test software applications
Collaborate with other engineers to solve complex technical problems
Write clean, maintainable code that follows industry best practices
Stay up-to-date on the latest technologies and trends
Contribute to a positive and collaborative team environment

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: The Digital Marketing Specialist is responsible for contributing to email and online marketing communications and campaigns that are distributed to member travel agencies and their consumer clients. The Digital Marketing Specialist also collaborates with travel supplier partners to ensure their products and promotional content are presented accurately and compellingly across marketing channels.
requirements: Bachelors degree in Marketing','1+ years experience in marketing, advertising, or a related field
Strong writing, proofreading, and verbal/interpersonal skills
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
Ability multitask and prioritize in a deadlinedriven environment
Innovation â€“ Forward thinking, curious, & creative

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: As a Data Scientist, you will analyze complex datasets, develop models, and provide insights to drive business decision-making. The ideal candidate has a strong statistical background, proficiency in Python or R, and experience working with large datasets.
requirements: Masters or PhD in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
Experience with machine learning algorithms
Proficient in Python, R, or similar languages
Ability to communicate complex findings to non-technical stakeholders
Experience with big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark) is a plus

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description: Join our design team to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. The UX/UI Designer will collaborate with product managers and developers to design innovative solutions. Strong skills in Adobe Creative Suite and a portfolio of previous work are required.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design or a related field
Proven experience in UX/UI design
Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD)
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles
Excellent communication and collaboration skills

jobs.title: Financial Analyst
jobs.description: We are seeking a Financial Analyst to support financial planning and analysis. Responsibilities include budgeting, forecasting, and providing insights into financial performance. The ideal candidate has a strong analytical background and proficiency in financial modeling.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field
Experience in financial analysis
Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent attention to detail and organizational abilities

jobs.title: Civil Engineer
jobs.description: Join our team of Civil Engineers working on large-scale infrastructure projects. The role involves design, analysis, and project management. The ideal candidate has a degree in Civil Engineering and experience in structural design.
requirements: Degree in Civil Engineering or a related field
Experience in structural design
Knowledge of engineering software (AutoCAD, SAP2000)
Strong project management skills
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities

jobs.title: Healthcare Researcher
jobs.description: Contribute to cutting-edge healthcare research projects. The Healthcare Researcher will gather and analyze data, conduct literature reviews, and support research initiatives. Background in healthcare or life sciences is required.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare Management or Life Sciences
Experience in healthcare research
Strong analytical and research skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work independently and collaboratively

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
jobs.description: Protect our organization's IT infrastructure by analyzing and implementing cybersecurity measures. The Cybersecurity Analyst will monitor security alerts, conduct risk assessments, and ensure compliance with security policies.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity or a related field
Experience in cybersecurity analysis
Knowledge of security frameworks and protocols
Certifications such as CISSP or CEH are a plus
Ability to stay updated on the latest cybersecurity trends

jobs.title: Biomedical Engineer
jobs.description: Contribute to the development of innovative medical devices. The Biomedical Engineer will design and test medical equipment, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and ensure compliance with regulatory standards.
requirements: Degree in Biomedical Engineering or a related field
Experience in medical device design
Knowledge of regulatory requirements (FDA, CE)
Strong problem-solving and teamwork skills
Excellent attention to detail

jobs.title: Environmental Scientist
jobs.description: Join our team focused on environmental sustainability. The Environmental Scientist will conduct research, analyze data, and provide recommendations for eco-friendly practices. Background in environmental science or a related field is required.
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Environmental Science
Experience in environmental research
Knowledge of environmental regulations
Strong data analysis and reporting skills
Passion for sustainability and environmental conservation

jobs.title: AI/ML Engineer
jobs.description: Seeking an AI/ML Engineer to develop and implement machine learning algorithms. The ideal candidate has a strong background in artificial intelligence, deep learning, and experience with frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
requirements: Master's or PhD in Computer Science or related field
Experience in AI/ML development
Proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks
Strong programming skills in Python
Ability to work on complex problem-solving

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description: Join our design team as a Graphic Designer to create visually stunning graphics for various projects. Proficiency in graphic design software and a keen eye for aesthetics are essential.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer
Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator)
Strong portfolio showcasing design projects
Creativity and attention to detail

jobs.title: Financial Planner

requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance or related field
Certified Financial Planner (CFP) designation
Experience in financial planning and analysis
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills

jobs.title: Game Developer

Experience in game development using Unity or Unreal Engine

Proven experience in digital marketing
Strong knowledge of SEO, SEM, and social media marketing
Analytical and data-driven mindset

requirements: Degree in Electrical Engineering or related field
Experience in schematic design and PCB layout
Proficiency in CAD software for electrical design
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

requirements: Degree in Fashion Design or related field
Proven experience as a Fashion Designer
Creative flair and strong artistic skills

requirements: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management or related field
Experience in supply chain analysis

requirements: PhD in Biotechnology, Genetics, or related field
Experience in biotech research
Knowledge of molecular biology techniques

jobs.description: Lead our human resources initiatives to attract, develop, and retain top talent. The HR Manager will oversee recruitment, employee relations, and HR strategy implementation.

Proven experience as an HR Manager
